definitions: the action of bringing something, especially a law or system, into existence or effect again

examples.text: a possible reintroduction of fees for students across the county

shortDefinitions: action of bringing something into existence or effect again

definitions: the action of putting a species of animal or plant back into a former habitat

examples.text: the reintroduction of diverse species of flora
the first ferret reintroductions took place in Wyoming

shortDefinitions: action of putting species of animal or plant back into former habitat
